heading: HR02219
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT A REVIEW OF ALL PENDING AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION PROPOSALS FOR THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT IN ORDER FOR CONGRESS TO DETERMINE THE SOUNDNESS AND FEASIBILITY OF SUCH PROPOSALS AND PROVIDE ITS RECOMMENDATIONS, WITH THE GOAL OF FACILITATING THE EXPEDITIOUS IMPROVEMENT OF OUR CIVIL AVIATION SYSTEM
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-10-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02219
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT A REVIEW OF ALL PENDING AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION PROPOSALS FOR THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT IN ORDER FOR CONGRESS TO DETERMINE THE SOUNDNESS AND FEASIBILITY OF SUCH PROPOSALS AND PROVIDE ITS RECOMMENDATIONS, WITH THE GOAL OF FACILITATING THE EXPEDITIOUS IMPROVEMENT OF OUR CIVIL AVIATION SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-10-03
